thread.title: Elizabeth Valentin
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Elizabeth Valentin

author: Elizabeth Valentin
title: Elizabeth Valentin
text: Everyone was so nice and welcoming. Not only the sales person but the business manager worked with me in every way they possibly could to make sure I was approved and make sure I was walking out of there with great satisfaction not only financially but car wise. I'm very happy with the car choice I will definitely be back if I choose to get another car and I've bragged to all my friends to come here !
